{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = H3C BE18000-Wi-Fi-7-Router.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Tri-Band Wi-Fi 7 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/IntelligentTerminalProducts/Magic/BE18000/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = H3C_Magic_BE18000 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = H3C |model = Magic |submodelappend = yes |submodel = BE18000 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/08/2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/H3C_Magic_BE18000 |wlclass = BE18000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ9574; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A73 |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz <!-- 2.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Aquantia;AQR107; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 10GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 7, WPA3, MLO, MU-MIMO, HE160, EHT320, 4096QAM |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax+be
|defaulip = 192.168.124.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN9224; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 1148 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN9274; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax/be |rad2be = 5765 |rad2ax = 4804 |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN9274; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax/be |rad3be = 11530 |rad3ax = 9608 |rad3ac = 1733 |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 6
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|H3C|List of 802.11be Hardware}}
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.techinsights.com/blog/first-commercially-available-wi-fi-7-80211-be-wireless-router-h3c-magic-be18000 ''H3C Magic BE18000 Wi-Fi 7 (802.11be) Wireless Router'' on '''TechInsights'''] :[[Qualcomm]] ''Networking Pro 1220'' [https://www.qualcomm.com/news/onq/2022/05/qualcomm-networking-pro-series-enters-wi-fi-7-era Platform] *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2018/06/26/qualcomm-and-new-h3c-ship-80211ax-enterprise-access-point ''New H3C Ship 802.11ax Enterprise Access Point'' on '''Qualcomm''']
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/first-draft-11ax-ap-to-ship-in-september.47425/ ''H3C WA6628 - First draft 11ax AP'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/06/27/qualcomm-ipq8078-h3c-wa6628-802-11ax-wifi-router-1000-clients/ ''H3C WA6628 802.11ax WiFi Enterprise Router'' on '''CNX-Software''']
===Models=== :;[https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/IntelligentTerminalProducts/Star_Products/ H3C Products] • [[List of 802.11be Hardware]] *[[H3C Magic BE18000]] • [[Qualcomm]] (''Networking Pro 1220'') *[[H3C Magic NX15000]] *[[H3C Magic NX30]] *[[H3C Magic NX54]] • AX5400 • [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/application/wireless-networks/wi-fi-networks/networking-device-finder/h3c-nx54 PR] • [https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/IntelligentTerminalProducts/Home_Network/NX54/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ5018 2x 1.0GHz (''Immersive Home 216'') *[[H3C BX54]] *[[H3C WA7338]] • BE11000 (11.53Gbps) • [https://24wireless.info/h3c-wi-fi-7-access-point PR] *[[H3C WA7638]] • BE18000 (18.44Gbps) • [https://24wireless.info/h3c-wi-fi-7-access-point PR]
:;[https://www.h3c.com/en/Products_Technology/Enterprise_Products/Wireless/ Wi-Fi 6 AP] *[[H3C WA6320]] (H) • 802.11ax Indoor AP *[[H3C WA6330]] • 802.11ax Indoor AP *[[H3C WA6526]] (E) • 802.11ax AP *[[H3C WA6528]] (i/X/E-T) • 802.11ax AP *[[H3C WA6620X]] • 802.11ax AP *[[H3C WA6630X]] • 802.11ax Outdoor AP *[[H3C WA6622]] • AX3000 • 802.11ax Indoor AP *[[H3C WA6628]] • AX6000 • 802.11ax Indoor AP *[[H3C WA6636]] • 802.11ax Indoor AP *[[H3C WA6638]] • AX6000 • 802.11ax Indoor AP
